::Dollen::

            Dollen smiled and walked in, then sat down in the pilot's seat.

                "I love flying these things!" He said, as he started it up.
He then took it up into the air, and flew towards the base.

             As he was flying he looked at GoldenEye, "Now darling, am I
heading the right now?"
